page.title: 05HOME LIFE IN DACRE.
page.content: Most families in Dacre have a mum and dad and two or three children.Most children like going on their bikes and their roller boots also they like swimming.Some children have stamp collections.At night they watch T.V. and go to bed at 9.00 to 10.00pm.Most mums do the shopping and they do the house work too.Currently most mums like to watch Wimbledon most dads watch farming .Most mums and dads do the gardening at weekends during the summer months.On Sundays after church some families take their nanas out for dinner and to Ullswater lake.When the weather is fine they go out for the whole day.Some families follow the local fox hunt.Most enjoy outdoor life and country pursuits .
